body.p:
State of Kentucky
Franklin County } Sct

personally appeared before me E. A. W. Roberts and made the following statements that he went to Jo Phieffers coffee house on Sunday morning the 3rd February 1861 between 5 and 6 oclock A. M. when he went there the door was locked when he knocked the door was opened he went in and that there was three negro men came in after him and one of them wanted to git something Joseph Pfieffer was in bed in the same Room and told his boy they could git nothing there one of the men had a bottle with about half a point of whisky in when they came in that these three negros nor either of them did not git a drop of whisky at Pfieffers at that time that he dose not now whose negros either was
